    • Uses of User in com.randomnoun.common.security

      Methods in com.randomnoun.common.security that return User 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      User Permission.getUser()
      Returns the user this permission applies to, or null if it is a user-based role.
      User SecurityContext.getUser​(long userId)
      Returns a User, given their userId
      User SecurityLoader.loadUser​(long userId)
      Load a user.
      Methods in com.randomnoun.common.security that return types with arguments of type User 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      java.util.List<User> SecurityContext.getAllUsers()
      Return a list of User objects representing all users contained in this security context.
      java.util.List<User> SecurityLoader.loadAllUsers()
      Return a list of User objects representing all users contained in this security context.
      Methods in com.randomnoun.common.security with parameters of type User 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      boolean SecurityAuthenticator.authenticate​(User user, java.lang.String password)
      Returns true if the supplied password authenticates the supplied user, false otherwise.
      boolean SecurityContext.authenticate​(User user, java.lang.String password)
      Authenticate the supplied username and password with the authentication provider.
      Permission SecurityContext.getPermission​(User user, java.lang.String permission)
      Returns the Permission object for a specific user/permission combination, or null if this permission is not granted.
      java.util.List<Permission> SecurityContext.getPermissions​(User user, java.lang.String permission)
      Returns a list of all Permission objects assigned to a user and all the roles that the user is a member of.
      java.util.List<Permission> SecurityContext.getUserPermissions​(User user)
      Retrieve a list of permissions for this user, as Permission objects.
      java.util.List<java.lang.String> SecurityContext.getUserRoles​(User user)
      Return a List of all roles in this security context, identified by String.
      boolean SecurityContext.hasPermission​(User user, java.lang.String permission)
      Returns true if a user is allowed to perform the permission supplied.
      boolean SecurityContext.hasPermission​(User user, java.lang.String permission, java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​java.lang.Object> context)
      Returns true if a user is allowed to perform the permission supplied, with given resource context.
      java.util.List<Permission> SecurityLoader.loadUserPermissions​(User user)
      Returns the list of permissions assigned to this user.
      java.util.List<Permission> SecurityContext.loadUserRolePermissions​(User user)  
      java.util.List<Permission> SecurityLoader.loadUserRolePermissions​(User user)
      Return a list of Permission objects associated with the roles possessed by a particular user.
      java.util.List<java.lang.String> SecurityLoader.loadUserRoles​(User user)
      Returns the list of roles assigned to this user.
      void SecurityLoader.saveUserRolesAndPermissions​(User user, java.util.List<java.lang.String> roles, java.util.List<Permission> userPermissions)
      Persists the role and permission information recorded for this user to the database.
      Constructors in com.randomnoun.common.security with parameters of type User 
      Constructor Description
      Permission​(User user, java.lang.String activity, java.lang.String resource, ResourceCriteria resourceCriteria)
      Create a new role-based permission.
